name: Comet Sighted
text: People are often superstitious and the appearance of a comet has convinced many that the end of times is soon to come. Whether or not this is actually the case, this is bound to cause some instability within the nation.

choices.text: It is an omen!
The end is nigh!
Keep looking at the sky!

name: Comet Spotted
text: A comet was sighted in the sky. Some people in the past believed that this portents fell times ahead. Others used to believe that they are in fact pixie fairies floating in the sky. Such primitive ways of thinking, it's almost embarassing that our ancestors used to believe in such nonsensical rubbish like that.

choices.text: Thank God we live in such enlightened times.

name: Artists Protest the Eiffel Tower
text: 'We, writers, painters, sculptors, architects and passionate devotees of the hitherto untouched beauty of this nation, protest with all our strength, against the erection of this useless and monstrous Eiffel Tower. To bring our arguments home, imagine for a moment a giddy, ridiculous tower dominating this city like a gigantic black smokestack, crushing under its barbaric bulk all of our humiliated monuments which will disappear in this ghastly dream.'

choices.text: Idiots
We can't take it down! We're using it as a radio tower!
uniques: Gain a free [Broadcast Tower] [in this city]

choices.text: Fine, let's tear it down.
uniques: [-1 Happiness] per [2] social policies adopted <for [999999] turns> <hidden from users>
[-5 Happiness, -1 Culture] [in capital] <for [999999] turns> <hidden from users>

name: A Destitute Noble
text: A destitute nobleman has arrived at your court. He is without Lord and pledges his service your name. The nobleman is ragged and unkempt, but adorned with many scars, and has evidently fielded many battles. It is up to you what is to be done with him.

choices.text: Turn him away! We don't need him stinking up the Court!
Have him cleaned up and suited with armor.
Confiscate what little estate he possesses and then have him executed!

name: The Guest Star
text: The year is 1054, a star has appeared in the heavens. It glows with a breathtaking brilliance, captivating the entirety of the nation. The event is surely one of great significance.

choices.text: Such beauty!
A astronomical miracle!

name: Solar Eclipse
text: The nation stares in awe as the Sun slowly disappears behind the black disc suspended in the sky, and the world turns to darkness despite it being mid-day. Your subjects are absolutely terrified.

choices.text: Our prayers and sacrifices shall bring back the light.
There must be a reasonable explanation.

name: Warbands
text: A warband, seeking refuge from some foreign war, has arrived at your Palace, and offer their services to you. These are no mere barbarians; these are diciplined soldiers. If not us, then they might turn to our enemies.

choices.text: We shall have no foreigners in our armies!
We must turn them away!
Pay them well, and bring them into our service!

name: Mercenaries
text: A band of mercenaries, fresh from some foreign war now settled, has arrived at your Palace, and offer their services to you. These are no mere vagabonds; these are professional soldiers. If not us, then they might turn to our enemies.

choices.text: We shall have no foreigners in our armies!
We must turn them away!
Pay them well, and bring them into our service!

name: Outlaws
text: A posse of outlaws, fresh from some foreign war now settled, has arrived at your Palace, and offer their services to you. These are no mere burgalars; these are trained raiders. If not us, then they might turn to our enemies.

choices.text: We shall have no foreigners in our armies!
We must turn them away!
Pay them well, and bring them into our service!

name: PMCs
text: An organisation of PMCs, fresh from some foreign war now settled, has sent a message to the military, and offer their services to you. These are no mere insurgents; these are true veterans. If not us, then they might turn to our enemies.

choices.text: We shall have no guns-for-hire in our armies!
We must turn them away!
Pay them well, and bring them into our service!

name: Struck Oil!
text: Glorious news! Our workers have found a new, rich source of oil on a nearby our existing oil wells! The oil is sitting there, just waiting for us to drill it out.

choices.text: Wonderful news!

name: A Beast Stalks the City
text: Rumors have begun to filter into the Palace that a monstrous beast stalks the city streets at the dead of night. Eye-witnesses claim that the beast is a demon, others claim it is the elusive wild haggis. Regardless, it is beginning to disquiet the city, and so the matter must be dealt with.

choices.text: I do not address mere rumors.
Send out some guards and bring back the pelt of this beast.
Capture it, put it in a zoo, and charge extra to have it seen.
I shall hunt this beast myself!

name: Miracle Harvest!
text: Owing to discovering fertilisers, our farmers accross the nation report an amazing surplus of food. Rarely has the earth ever yielded so much!

choices.text: Food for all!

name: Social Reforms
text: Your advisors have proposed a number of policies that would likely profit our nation greatly if taken into effect. They are extremely radical, however, and it is possible that many will not take well to the changes.

choices.text: No! These drastic reforms will harm the nation, not help it!
These reforms shall be of great use, implement them at once!
Whoever thinks this is a good idea are traitors to the state! Have them executed!

name: Codify Laws
text: Over the years various laws and decrees have been accumulated. In the interests of efficient administration it would be better to codify them into a single corpus of law so everyone will know their rights.

choices.text: And so it shall be.
uniques: Gain a free [Code of Laws] [in capital]

name: Nationalize the Utilities
text: Should we nationalize those industries which are essential for our people's welfare? The industries' owners won't like it, but the nation will be better off for it in the long run.

choices.text: These industries shall stay private!
For the People!

name: Subsidize
text: Problems with traffic congestion hinder productivity in our nation. If we were to promote public transport, we should be able to ensure that both people and resources can get to where they need to be on time.

choices.text: Expand bus and tram routes.
Fund an underground subway.

name: Mystic
text: An itinerant mystic had made some spiced cider from the fruit trees he has planted during his annual pilgrimage. Crowds are already gathering, sharing food and listening to the mystic's sermons.

choices.text: Listen to his sermons, they are quite thought-provoking.
Take up the product, and share it with the world!
Tell the mystic to be quiet! I deal with enough crazy people already!

name: Harvest
text: This years harvest was more bountiful than normal, with granaries, flour mills and bakeries full to the brim with food for the people!

choices.text: A glorious harvest for a glorious year!

name: Famine
text: This years harvest was less bountiful than normal, with granaries, flour mills and bakeries practically empty. How will the people feed themselves this year?

choices.text: Who could have cursed this land with famine?

name: Desertion
text: Some of our troops have grown weary because of this war. Many of them are deserting their ranks and running away, making it difficult for our attacks to succeed.

choices.text: There is nothing we can do. Tell our generals to just bear this burden for now.
Increase their pay! A man will walk to Hell and back as long as they are given enough gold.
Put the deserters on trial and court-martial them. There is no space for conscientious objectors in our army!
Execute any deserters. We need to set an example to stop our troops leaving the front.

name: Modern Olympics
text: Our archaeologists have discovered that our ancestors from antiquity participated in a large sports competition called 'The Olympics' every four years to appease the Gods.

choices.text: I have heard talks about some nations setting up an organisation in order to revive these games. I don't see why we shouldn't join it!

name: Olympiad
text: The International Olympics Committee have decided that we should host the next Olympic Games! How should we plan for this event?

choices.text: Prepare the Capital for the Games. It is the most suitable venue for the event.
Prepare the entire nation for the Games. This way will show the world the glory of our empire!
uniques: [+5 Gold] [in all cities] <in cities with a [Stadium]> <for [5] turns>

choices.text: We shall only accept this offer if we are able to deny our enemies from participating. We need to beat them on the front, not on the field.
uniques: Only available <when at war> <hidden from users>

name: Economic Depression
text: A rapid turn of events have lead to the collapse of our nation's economy, and the Stock Market falling to levels unseen before. Former barons and lords of business are finding their money losing their value rapidly, and the workers and nearly workers are now in crippling poverty. The next few years shall be remembered as an economic torment for the rest of history!

choices.text: Damn.

name: Economic Boom
text: Crowd gather around the stock markets as the conomy starts to boom. Businesses are rapidly growing in size, and their worker's standard of living has never been better. The next few years shall be known as an economic paradise for the rest of history!

choices.text: Great!

name: Research
text: Some of our top scientists have rapidly increased our understanding on how the world works. How shall our nation support these researchers?

choices.text: Use their research to support our current military effort
uniques: [-25]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities] <for [10] turns>
Only available <when at war> <hidden from users>

choices.text: Knowledge is of no use if it is not passed on.
uniques: [+3 Happiness, +3 Science] from all [Science] buildings <for [10] turns>

choices.text: Support the Academia, and fund their research.

name: Asteroid
text: Worrying news has come from our top astronomers. It appears that an asteroid is expected to hit our planet, directly in our nation! Peaople are anxious, and many are losing hope, believing this is the beginning of Doomsday. What shall we do?

choices.text: We shall prevent that asteroid from hitting Earth, no matter the cost! Our nation shall be the saviour of this planet!
uniques: All newly-trained [Military] units [in all cities] receive the [Saviours of the Planet] promotion <for [9999] turns>
[Military] units gain the [Saviours of the Planet] promotion
Only available <when number of [[Nuclear Missile] Units] is more than [0]> <hidden from users>

choices.text: Evacuate all civilians immediately! We can't stop the asteroid, we can prevevnt the devestation it will cause.
uniques: [+5 Happiness] <in cities with a [Bomb Shelter]> <for [10] turns>
[-5 Happiness] <in cities without a [Bomb Shelter]> <for [10] turns>

choices.text: Screw the people, grap all my top advisors and GET ME OUT OF HERE!

name: Obstacle
text: For years now, the grand building that has been serving as the seat of power of our nation has fallen into disrepair. Cracks and mould crawl out of far corners of walls, doors are unable to be closed as their hinges wear away, the beautiful art that line corridors and rooms have been smotherd in inch-thich layers of dust and grime. This building is no longer deemed fit for its purpose, and action needs to be taken immediately. What shall we do?

choices.text: We shall build a new building for our government! There may already be people and property present where the building site needs to be... but surely a bit of 'convincing' shall remove them from the area.
The embarassment of having such a beutiful piece of architecture being tarnished from decades of neglct shall not carry on! We shall renovate it immediately!

name: America UE
text: Mr President, there has been recent discontent across our nation. Our people are at odds with each other, with one group advocating for the expansion of the use of slaves in order to revitalise the economy, while another is promoting the idea of 'Manifest Destiny' and the expansion of our nation to the uncivilised wilderness so that it can secure all the potential resources it needs. If one side does not triumph over another soon, our nation will decend into Civil War. What shall we do, Mr President?

choices.text: By expanding into the frontiers and bringing civilisation to these untamed lands, the United States shall secure its position in this world. Forwards to our Destiny!
uniques: [-50]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities] <for [40] turns>

choices.text: Expanding the slave markets will allow us to have access to more cheap labour, allowing us to develop more quickly and efficiently. For industry and progress!

Both sides ignore the fact that the very existence of this nation is to protect the freedoms of all. We shall not do any of the barbaric practices these groups propose, even if it will cause a Civil War. Liberty for all, no mattter the cost!
uniques: All newly-trained [Land] units [in all cities] receive the [We the People] promotion <for [9999] turns> <hidden from users>
[Land] units gain the [We the People] promotion

name: Arabia UE
text: O Great Caliph, from the arid deserts, our people have forged a grand civilisation. Now it is time to decide what path our glorious nation should take. How shall our Caliphate and the Arab people be remembered for the rest of time?

choices.text: It is time for our grand conquest! The world shall look at our conquests in awe, and we shall be remembered indefinitely!
We should be known for our great contributions to science and philosophy. Our scholars and ulama shall be world-renowned masters of knowledge!

choices.text: Our trade routes have made our people some of the wealthiest in the world. The wonder of our riches should be what we are known for!

name: Austria UE

choices.text: This duke has been on my mind recently, his wit and charm amused me greatly last time we met. I believe that he is the one for me!
In order to secure as much territory for the State, I shall marry this earl. His land shall allow us to greatly expand Austria.

name: Aztecs UE
text: Great Emperor of Tenochtitlan, our sacrifices to the Gods have allowed us to prosper and rise above other nations, but the high preists are concerened about our future. They have observed worrying patterns in the stars, pointing to our nation's demise. What shall we do to prevent these disasters from happening?

choices.text: The Gods are testing us so that they know that we are worthy of life. We shall devote more sacrifices to them. The blood from the temples shall not stop flowing!

Comment [Earn 200% of killed Military unit's Strength as [Faith]]

name: Babylon UE
text: O Great Lawgiver, King of All Four Corners of the Totality, the night sky has been filled with crimson flame and streams of smoke. The great priests have claimed that our creator-god, Marduk, is waging a war against Tiamat, the mother of all Gods. How shall our empire respond to this heavenly conflict?

choices.text: This is a blessing from Marduk! Our creator shall protect us from the envious and vile forces of Tiamat, and Babylon shall be his loyal servant
uniques: [+2 Food, +2 Science] from all [Faith] buildings <for [20] turns>

choices.text: Marduk is sending us a warning, showing that if we depart from the Gods, we shall suffer the same fate as his enemies. We shall build a Celestial Gate to show that we remain loyal to Marduk!
Get all the wise men in Babylon to observe this holy battle, quick! This war will only happen once, and we shall not have the chance to observe it in a later age.

name: Byzantium UE

choices.text: They must be planning to stage a coup with the army, meaning we cannot trust even or own troops. Hire some mercenaries, so that we have soldiers that are not under the thumb of the Patriarchy!

Support of the Church is vital for the Patriarch to exist. If we help the Church deal with its current isues with iconoclasm, we might sway them to our side and deny the Patriachy any legitimate support.
Only the external threats to Byzantium keep the Patriarchy in power. By destroying our foreign enemies, we would be able to cripple the Patriarchy!

choices.text: I have heard of a local warlord that will be willing to be the new King. Marrying him will strengthen our army significantly. This will be a match made in heaven, ...or wherever this warlord beleives he will end up.

There is a young naval commander that has successfuly led many daring raids on the ports of our enemies. This will help us strengthen our navy significantly. As long as he doesn't have an eyepatch or pegleg, he shall be my new husband.

name: Celts UE

choices.text: Our lands are full of tin and lead. If we manage to exploit these resources, we could have a monopoly on the worlds tin supply!
Our tribes need to unite so that we do not falter to the iron fist of our enemies. There shall be one united Celtica, a nation against imperialism and oppression!
We need to ensure that our culture does not be overcomed be our enemy's traditions. We must encourage our people to take up the arts, so that the Celtic culture shall stand the test of time!

choices.text: He shall help me purge the old, idiosyncratic ways of the nobility and start a lineage of fresh leaders. Now Egypt shall not fall behind its enemies!

name: Ethiopia UE
text: Ras Tafari, your people gather in the city square, waiting for you to show them the wisdom of Solomon. Show them the wisdom of Solomon, oh Negusa Nagast!

In this world plagued by division, we allow things like race and creed to set us apart. But God does not see the color of our skin, only the goodness of our soul. We will write it in our songs, in our tales, in our laws.

When they came to hear the Lord, they were called away to eat. But instead, he told them, stay, and fed them with manna from Heaven. How can we come closer to the Lord when our thoughts are shackled to the necessities of Earth. I will see that no man wants for bread, but no man can live by bread alone...
